title: Add invite_link to Chat model and fetch on registration
description:
## Context
- Chat model has no inviteLink field
- t.me/c/ links only work for supergroups, not regular groups
- Need to store invite_link in DB and use it for 'Open chat' button

## Requirements
1. Add inviteLink field to Chat model (prisma schema)
2. Create migration
3. On chat registration (/connect), fetch invite link via Telegram API:
   - ctx.telegram.exportChatInviteLink(chatId) or createChatInviteLink
4. Store invite_link in Chat record
5. Update alert.keyboard.ts to use inviteLink if available, fallback to t.me/c/ for supergroups

## Files to modify
- backend/prisma/schema.prisma (add inviteLink String?)
- backend/src/bot/handlers/invitation.handler.ts (fetch and store invite link)
- backend/src/bot/keyboards/alert.keyboard.ts (use inviteLink in buildAlertKeyboard)

## Telegram API
- ctx.telegram.exportChatInviteLink(chatId) - returns primary invite link
- ctx.telegram.createChatInviteLink(chatId) - creates new invite link
close_reason: Implemented and deployed

title: Notify all accountants from accountantUsernames array
description:
## Context
- Currently only assignedAccountant receives DM notification
- accountantUsernames array may contain multiple accountants
- Need to notify ALL accountants, not just the assigned one

## Requirements
1. In alert-callback.handler.ts, collect all accountant telegram_ids:
   - assignedAccountant.telegramId (primary)
   - For each username in accountantUsernames, lookup in users table by telegramUsername
2. Send notification to ALL found telegram_ids (not just one)
3. Fallback to group mention if no telegram_ids found

## Files to modify
- backend/src/bot/handlers/alert-callback.handler.ts

## DB Query needed
SELECT telegram_id FROM users WHERE telegram_username IN (accountantUsernames)

## Edge cases
- Duplicate: assignedAccountant might also be in accountantUsernames - dedupe
- Not found: username in array but no matching user - skip silently
- All fail: fallback to group mention
close_reason: Implemented and deployed
